## **About**

I am a digital workplace strategist and knowledge management consultant with over 15 years of international experience across North America, Europe, and Asia.  
My work focuses on helping organizations enhance collaboration, adopt AI tools, and align knowledge practices with strategic goals.  

I am currently pursuing my MBA at University Canada West and I combine academic research on AI in education with hands-on experience leading digital transformation initiatives in large enterprises.  
I am passionate about making knowledge systems work smarter - so people can, too.
